mention.text: Powell , who would be the youngest officer to head the Joint Chiefs
Powell , who would be the first black to head the nation 's military services , Sen. Albert Gore Jr. -LRB- D-Tenn

Colin L. Powell as an outstanding choice The Senate panel voted 20 to 0 to recommend Powell 's nomination to the full Senate If confirmed , Powell , who would be the youngest officer to head the Joint Chiefs , would replace Adm. William J. Crowe Jr. on Oct. 1 The committee action came after several hours of a confirmation hearing at which Powell told the panel that Colin L. Powell has '' some level of confidence '' that reforms might succeed in the Soviet Union Such reforms , Colin L. Powell said , would give the United States '' opportunities to reshape our defense programs , our national security policies and our armed forces
the rising skepticism , Senate Armed Services Committee Chairman Sam Nunn -LRB- D-Ga
the rising skepticism , Senate Armed Services Committee
the rising skepticism , Senate Armed Services Committee
the Senate panel 's ranking minority member
the Senate panel 's ranking minority member
the President and his principal advisers
the President and his principal advisers President
